data.name: SlipDream Resonator
data.detailed_description:
SlipDream Resonator is a futuristic, multi-directional rhythm game with unique twin-stick analogue controls. Inspired by both classic rhythm games and top-down shooters, SlipDream Resonator offers addictive arcade gameplay designed to challenge while featuring eye catching visuals and a heart pumping soundtrack.

Integration through Simulation




SlipDream is a state of consciousness that allows a person to dream while being fully awake. As an attempt to create a machine that could induce such a state SlipDream Resonator was created. The simulated levels embedded within have been programmed to fully activate the user's mind and body through false stimulus and a direct link to our cloud based neural encoder. The path has been laid before you, embodiment is at your fingertips, integration has already begun.

20+ Music based levels


SlipDream Resonator features over 20 levels each with a unique soundtrack and background visual. With 4 difficulty levels SlipDream is accessible to all skill levels while still offering a challenge to the true die-hards.

Power-ups




Power-ups have been dispersed in each simulated level to help aid in difficult moments and encourage breakthroughs. The 4 available power-ups are detailed below.

  • Atomic
Destroys all spawned notes at once. One time use per activation.

  • Circle
Engages every node at once. Useful for sustained notes and breakthrough levels. Three uses per activation

  • Time
Temporarily slows down time. One time use per activation

  • Laser
Destroys all spawned notes in a specific lane. Three uses per activation

Breakthrough Levels


SlipDream Resonator has been split into a digital curriculum of 5 segments. The final level in each segment has been brutally designed to test if you are truly ready to proceed with the curriculum. Inspired by bullet hell shooters these sequences are impossible to perfect and instead prioritize basic survival. Use you quick reflexes and instinct to transcend your limitations and breakthrough.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later, 64-bit versions
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Processor, 2ghz+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
